availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Blake (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Coleman Blake and Nancy Gregory Blake. Attended school in Breckinridge County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Breckinridge County, Kentucky, in 1860. Laborer in Breckinridge County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 110B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Cloverport, p. 537.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Breckinridge County, KY, September 1863, p. 2.
Indiana Death Certificates, 1900â€“2011, Indiana State Department of Health and Vital Records, Indiana Archives and Records Administration, Indianapolis, IN, Certificate 150.
